Dark Magician: If this card is Tributed for a Tribute Summon, it is not 'sent from the field to the Graveyard'.
If this card is Tributed for 'Dedication through Light and Darkness', 'Dark Magic Attack' cannot be activated that turn.
This card can be Special Summoned with 'Ancient Rules'.
Blue-Eyes White Dragon: Effects that respecify ATK/DEF values, like 'Shield & Sword', don't count as increasing or decreasing the ATK/DEF.
This card can be Special Summoned with 'Ancient Rules'.
Cards like 'Burst Stream of Destruction' that require 'Blue-Eyes White Dragon' specifically require the original card, not substitutes like 'Blue-Eyes Alternative White Dragon'.
Pot of Greed: You cannot activate this card if there are fewer than 2 cards in your Deck.
Both cards are drawn simultaneously, not one at a time.
Ash Blossom & Joyous Spring: This card can only negate effects that would add a card from the Deck to the hand, send a card from the Deck to the GY, or Special Summon from the Deck.
You can activate this card's effect during either player's turn.
This card's effect cannot be activated in response to a cost, only to an effect.
Called by the Grave: If you target a monster with this card, and the monster is face-up in an Extra Monster Zone, that monster's effect is negated until the end of the next turn.
If you target a monster with this card, and that monster is Special Summoned from the GY, this card continues to negate that monster's effects.
This card only negates activated effects of the targeted monster, not continuous effects.
Infinite Impermanence: If this card is activated from your hand, it only negates the effects of monsters in the same column until the end of the turn.
If this card is Set, it must remain Set for a turn before it can be activated.
The column effect applies even if the targeted monster is no longer on the field when this card resolves.
Mystical Space Typhoon: This card does not negate the effects of cards it destroys.
If you target a card that is chained and leaves the field, this card's effect resolves without effect.
Mirror Force: This card cannot be activated unless your opponent declares an attack with a monster.
This card does not target any cards. It will destroy all Attack Position monsters your opponent controls at resolution.
If your opponent's monster has protection from destruction effects, it will not be destroyed by this card.
Monster Reborn: You can target any monster in either player's GY.
If a monster was not properly summoned first (like a Fusion or Synchro Monster), it cannot be Special Summoned by this card.
The monster is Special Summoned in the same battle position it was in when it was sent to the GY.
Exodia the Forbidden One: You must have all 5 pieces of Exodia in your hand to win the Duel.
The victory condition is a condition, not an effect, and cannot be negated.
If any piece of Exodia is removed from your hand, you will not win the Duel until you have all 5 pieces in your hand again.
Raigeki: This card destroys all monsters your opponent controls at the time of resolution.
This card does not target any cards.
If your opponent controls no monsters, you can still activate this card, but it will resolve with no effect.
Solemn Judgment: This card can negate the activation of a Spell/Trap Card or monster effect, or negate a Normal/Special Summon.
You pay half your LP at activation, not resolution.
This card can negate the Special Summon of multiple monsters, as long as they are being Summoned simultaneously.
Harpie's Feather Duster: This card destroys all Spell and Trap Cards your opponent controls at the time of resolution.
This card does not target any cards.
If your opponent controls no Spell/Trap Cards, you can still activate this card, but it will resolve with no effect.
Snake-eye Flamberge Dragon: You can activate the effect to add a 'Snake-eye' card even if this card was Special Summoned by a method other than its own effect.
The effect to destroy cards is limited to face-up cards your opponent controls.
Both effects of this card may be used once per turn each, not just one or the other.
Crystal Beast Sapphire Pegasus: You can only place a 'Crystal Beast' monster from your hand, Deck, or GY to your Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Spell Card by this card's effect.
If you have no empty Spell & Trap Zones, you cannot activate this effect.
When this card is destroyed while it is a monster, you can place it in your Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Spell Card instead of sending it to the GY.
Allure Queen LV5: This card can equip a Level 5 or lower monster to itself by its effect.
While this card is equipped with a monster, the equipped monster's effects are negated.
During your Standby Phase, if this card is equipped with a Level 5 monster, you can send this card to the GY to Special Summon 'Allure Queen LV7' from your hand or Deck.
World Legacy - \"World Chalice\": You can only use each effect of 'World Legacy - "World Chalice"' once per turn.
The effect to add a 'World Chalice' monster from your Deck to your hand activates when this card is sent from the field to the GY.
The effect to Special Summon this card from your GY can be activated during either player's turn.
Link Spider: You can only Special Summon a Normal Monster to this card's linked zone.
You can only use this effect once per turn.
The Normal Monster Special Summoned by this effect must be Level 4 or lower.
Accesscode Talker: This card gains ATK equal to the combined Link Ratings of Link Monsters used as material for its Link Summon x 1000.
You can banish a Link Monster from your GY to destroy cards on the field up to the Link Rating of the banished monster.
Your opponent cannot activate cards or effects in response to this card's effect activation.
Zeus: You can detach 2 materials from this card; send all other cards on the field to the GY.
This is a Quick Effect that can be activated during either player's turn.
This effect sends cards to the GY, it does not destroy them.
